FabricClient.ApplicationManagementClient FabricClient.ApplicationManagementClient Class

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Provides the functionality to manage Service Fabric applications.

Edit

In this Article

CopyApplicationPackage(String, String, String) CopyApplicationPackage(String, String, String)

Edit

Uploads an application package to the Image Store in preparation for provisioning a new application type.

public void CopyApplicationPackage(string imageStoreConnectionString, string applicationPackagePath, string applicationPackagePathInImageStore)Public Sub CopyApplicationPackage(imageStoreConnectionString As String, applicationPackagePath As String, applicationPackagePathInImageStore As String)
Parameters
imageStoreConnectionString
String String

The connection string for the Image Store as specified in the Cluster Manifest.

applicationPackagePath
String String

The full path to the source application package.

applicationPackagePathInImageStore
String String

The relative path for the destination in the Image Store. This same relative path should be passed into the subsequent ProvisionApplicationAsync(String) call.

Exceptions
UnauthorizedAccessException UnauthorizedAccessException

There was an error accessing a file on the Image Store.

FileNotFoundException FileNotFoundException

A required file was not found on the Image Store.

DirectoryNotFoundException DirectoryNotFoundException

A required directory was not found on the Image Store.

PathTooLongException PathTooLongException

A path to an Image Store file/directory was too long.

FabricException FabricException

ImageStoreIOException: There was an IO error communicating with the Image Store.

TimeoutException TimeoutException

The request timed out but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The request was canceled before the timeout expired but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

Edit

Creates and instantiates the specific Service Fabric application.

public Task CreateApplicationAsync(ApplicationDescription applicationDescription)Public Function CreateApplicationAsync(applicationDescription As ApplicationDescription) As Task
Parameters
applicationDescription
ApplicationDescription ApplicationDescription

The description of the application.

Returns
Task Task

A Task representing the operation.

Exceptions
FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

The FabricClient object is in a closed state. Dispose of the FabricClient object you are using and instantiate a new FabricClient object.

FabricException FabricException

ImageBuilderValidationError: The create application request is not valid with respect to the provisioned manifests for the requested application type.

InvalidNameUri: The application name is not a valid Naming URI.

CorruptedImageStoreObjectFound: A corrupted file was encountered on the ImageStore.

FabricElementAlreadyExistsException FabricElementAlreadyExistsException

ApplicationAlreadyExists: The application has already been created.

FabricElementNotFoundException FabricElementNotFoundException

ApplicationTypeNotFound: The requested application type has not been provisioned yet.

UnauthorizedAccessException UnauthorizedAccessException

There was an error accessing a file on the Image Store.

FileNotFoundException FileNotFoundException

DirectoryNotFoundException DirectoryNotFoundException

A required directory was not found on the Image Store.

IOException IOException

The request timed out but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The request was canceled before the timeout expired but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

ArgumentException ArgumentException

The application capacity parameters specified are incorrect. Refer to MinimumNodes, MaximumNodes and Metrics for correct specification of application capacity parameters.

DeleteApplicationAsync(DeleteApplicationDescription) DeleteApplicationAsync(DeleteApplicationDescription)

Edit

Deletes the application instance from the cluster and deletes all services belonging to the application.

public Task DeleteApplicationAsync(DeleteApplicationDescription deleteApplicationDescription)Public Function DeleteApplicationAsync(deleteApplicationDescription As DeleteApplicationDescription) As Task
Parameters
deleteApplicationDescription
DeleteApplicationDescription DeleteApplicationDescription

The description of the application to be deleted.

Returns
Task Task

A Task representing the operation.

Exceptions
FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

The FabricClient object is in a closed state. Dispose of the FabricClient object you are using and instantiate a new FabricClient object.

FabricElementNotFoundException FabricElementNotFoundException

ApplicationNotFound: The application does not exist.

FabricTransientException FabricTransientException

ApplicationUpgradeInProgress: The application is being upgraded.

TimeoutException TimeoutException

The request timed out but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The request was canceled before the timeout expired but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

Remarks

All application state will be lost and cannot be recovered after the application is deleted.

A forceful deletion call can convert on-going normal deletion to forceful one.

DeployServicePackageToNode(String, String, String, PackageSharingPolicyList, String, TimeSpan, CancellationToken) DeployServicePackageToNode(String, String, String, PackageSharingPolicyList, String, TimeSpan, CancellationToken)

Edit

Downloads packages associated with service manifest to image cache on specified node. 

public Task DeployServicePackageToNode(string applicationTypeName, string applicationTypeVersion, string serviceManifestName, PackageSharingPolicyList sharingPolicies, string nodeName, TimeSpan timeout, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Public Function DeployServicePackageToNode(applicationTypeName As String, applicationTypeVersion As String, serviceManifestName As String, sharingPolicies As PackageSharingPolicyList, nodeName As String, timeout As TimeSpan, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
Parameters
applicationTypeName
String String

ApplicationTypeName associated with service manifest to be downloaded

applicationTypeVersion
String String

Version of ApplicationType

serviceManifestName
String String

Name of service manifest whose packages need to be downloaded

sharingPolicies
PackageSharingPolicyList PackageSharingPolicyList

Sharing policy representing packages that need to be copied to shared folders

nodeName
String String

Name of the node where packages need to be downloaded.

timeout
TimeSpan TimeSpan

The maximum amount of time the system will allow this operation to continue before returning T:System.TimeoutException

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The CancellationTokenthat the operation is observing. It can be used to propagate notification that the operation should be canceled

Returns
Task Task

A Task representing the operation.

MoveNextApplicationUpgradeDomainAsync(ApplicationUpgradeProgress) MoveNextApplicationUpgradeDomainAsync(ApplicationUpgradeProgress)

Edit

Instructs the Service Fabric to upgrade the application instance in the next upgrade domain.

public Task MoveNextApplicationUpgradeDomainAsync(ApplicationUpgradeProgress upgradeProgress)Public Function MoveNextApplicationUpgradeDomainAsync(upgradeProgress As ApplicationUpgradeProgress) As Task
Parameters
upgradeProgress
ApplicationUpgradeProgress ApplicationUpgradeProgress

The Upgrade progress of the application instance of interest. This provides information about the next upgrade domain to be upgraded.

Returns
Task Task

A Task representing the operation.

Exceptions
FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

The FabricClient object is in a closed state. Dispose of the FabricClient object you are using and instantiate a new FabricClient object.

FabricElementNotFoundException FabricElementNotFoundException

ApplicationNotFound: The application does not exist.

TimeoutException TimeoutException

The request timed out but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The request was canceled before the timeout expired but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

Remarks

Service Fabric would only move to the next upgrade domain if it has completed the upgrade domain it is currently updating. In other words, UpgradeState property should be Pending before calling this method.

Service Fabric would only move to the next upgrade domain if it has completed the upgrade domain it is currently updating. In other words, UpgradeState property should be Pending before calling this method.

Task Task

A Task representing the operation.

Exceptions
FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

The FabricClient object is in a closed state. Dispose of the FabricClient object you are using and instantiate a new FabricClient object.

FabricException FabricException

ImageBuilderValidationError: There are errors in the manifests being provisioned.

ApplicationTypeProvisionInProgress: Another version of the application type is currently being provisioned.

InvalidNameUri: The application name is not a valid Naming URI.

CorruptedImageStoreObjectFound: A corrupted file was encountered on the ImageStore.

FabricElementAlreadyExistsException FabricElementAlreadyExistsException

ApplicationTypeAlreadyExists: The application type has already been provisioned

UnauthorizedAccessException UnauthorizedAccessException

There was an error accessing a file on the ImageStore.

FileNotFoundException FileNotFoundException

A required file was not found on the ImageStore.

DirectoryNotFoundException DirectoryNotFoundException

A required directory was not found on the ImageStore.

PathTooLongException PathTooLongException

A path to an ImageStore file/directory was too long.

FabricException FabricException

ImageStoreIOException: There was an IO error communicating with the ImageStore.

TimeoutException TimeoutException

The request timed out but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The request was canceled before the timeout expired but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

Remarks

This is mandatory before an application instance can be created.

Edit

Removes or unregisters a Service Fabric application type from the cluster.

public Task UnprovisionApplicationAsync(string applicationTypeName, string applicationTypeVersion)Public Function UnprovisionApplicationAsync(applicationTypeName As String, applicationTypeVersion As String) As Task
Parameters
applicationTypeName
String String

The name of the application type.

applicationTypeVersion
String String

The version of the application type.

Returns
Task Task

A Task representing the operation.

Exceptions
FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

The FabricClient object is in a closed state. Dispose of the FabricClient object you are using and instantiate a new FabricClient object.

FabricException FabricException

ApplicationTypeInUse: The application type is being used by one or more applications.

FabricElementNotFoundException FabricElementNotFoundException

ApplicationNotFound: The application does not exist.

TimeoutException TimeoutException

The request timed out but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The request was canceled before the timeout expired but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

Remarks

This method can only be called if all application instance of the application type has been deleted. Once the application type is unregistered, no new application instance can be created for this particular application type.

UpdateApplicationAsync(ApplicationUpdateDescription) UpdateApplicationAsync(ApplicationUpdateDescription)

Edit

Updates a Service Fabric application.

public Task UpdateApplicationAsync(ApplicationUpdateDescription applicationUpdateDescription)Public Function UpdateApplicationAsync(applicationUpdateDescription As ApplicationUpdateDescription) As Task
Parameters
applicationUpdateDescription
ApplicationUpdateDescription ApplicationUpdateDescription

Application update description.

Returns
Task Task

A Task representing the operation.

Exceptions
FabricException FabricException

InvalidNameUri: The application name is not a valid Naming URI.

FabricElementNotFoundException FabricElementNotFoundException

ApplicationNotFound: The application does not exist.

FabricTransientException FabricTransientException

ApplicationUpdateInProgress: Another application update is already in progress.

ArgumentException ArgumentException

The application update parameters specified are incorrect. Refer to MinimumNodes, MaximumNodes and Metrics for correct specification of application capacity parameters.

It is possible that parameters in ApplicationUpdateDescription are valid, but when combined with existing application capacity parameters they produce an invalid combination. For example, setting MinimumNodes to a value that is higher than the one that was specified in MaximumNodes when application was created.

PathTooLongException PathTooLongException

A path to an ImageStore file/directory was too long.

The request timed out but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.

The request was canceled before the timeout expired but may have already been accepted for processing by the system.
